verses.text: \w But|strong="G1161"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Sapphira|strong="G4551"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w sold|strong="G4453"\w* a \w possession|strong="G2933"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* kept \w back|strong="G3557"\w* \add part\add* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w price|strong="G5092"\w*, \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* being \w privy|strong="G4894"\w* \add to it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G5342"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w part|strong="G3313"\w*, and \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \add it\add* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* the \w apostles’|strong="G0652"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* \w hath|strong="G4137"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w* \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* to \w lie|strong="G5574"\w* to \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to keep \w back|strong="G3557"\w* \add part\add* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* the \w price|strong="G5092"\w* of the \w land|strong="G5564"\w*?

Whiles it \w remained|strong="G3306"\w*, was \w it|strong="G3306"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* thine \w own|strong="G4671"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w* after it was \w sold|strong="G4097"\w*, was \w it|strong="G5225"\w* \w not|strong="G3780"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* thine \w own|strong="G4674"\w* \w power|strong="G1849"\w*? \w why|strong="G5101"\w* hast thou \w conceived|strong="G5087"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w thing|strong="G4229"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*? thou \w hast|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lied|strong="G5574"\w* unto \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Ananias|strong="G0367"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w* fell \w down|strong="G4098"\w*, and gave up the \w ghost|strong="G1634"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w them|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the young \w men|strong="G3501"\w* \w arose|strong="G0450"\w*, \w wound|strong="G4958"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w up|strong="G4958"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w carried|strong="G1627"\w* \add him\add* \w out|strong="G1627"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w buried|strong="G2290"\w* \add him\add*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w about|strong="G5613"\w* the \w space|strong="G1292"\w* of \w three|strong="G5140"\w* \w hours|strong="G5610"\w* after, when \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w wife|strong="G1135"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* was \w done|strong="G1096"\w*, came \w in|strong="G1525"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* unto \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Tell|strong="G2036"\w* \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w whether|strong="G1487"\w* ye \w sold|strong="G0591"\w* the \w land|strong="G5564"\w* for so \w much|strong="G5118"\w*? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* she \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Yea|strong="G3483"\w*, for so \w much|strong="G5118"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, How is \w it|strong="G5101"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5213"\w* have agreed \w together|strong="G4856"\w* to \w tempt|strong="G3985"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*? \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w feet|strong="G4228"\w* of \w them|strong="G3588"\w* which have \w buried|strong="G2290"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w* \add are\add* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* shall \w carry|strong="G1627"\w* \w thee|strong="G4571"\w* \w out|strong="G1627"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* fell she \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w straightway|strong="G3916"\w* \w at|strong="G3844"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w feet|strong="G4228"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* yielded up the \w ghost|strong="G1634"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* the young \w men|strong="G3495"\w* came \w in|strong="G1525"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w carrying|strong="G1627"\w* \add her\add* \w forth|strong="G1627"\w*, \w buried|strong="G2290"\w* \add her\add* \w by|strong="G4314"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w* \w husband|strong="G0435"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w fear|strong="G5401"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* as many \w as|strong="G3956"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* of the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w were|strong="G1096"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* wrought \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*; (\w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Solomon’s|strong="G4672"\w* \w porch|strong="G4745"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* of the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* \w durst|strong="G5111"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* join \w himself|strong="G2853"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w magnified|strong="G3170"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w believers|strong="G4100"\w* \w were|strong="G4369"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w added|strong="G4369"\w* to the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w multitudes|strong="G4128"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* of \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w women|strong="G1135"\w*.)

Insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they brought \w forth|strong="G1627"\w* the \w sick|strong="G0772"\w* into the \w streets|strong="G4113"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \add them\add* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w beds|strong="G2825"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w couches|strong="G2895"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* at the \w least|strong="G2579"\w* the \w shadow|strong="G4639"\w* of \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* passing \w by|strong="G2064"\w* might \w overshadow|strong="G1982"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

There \w came|strong="G4905"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* a \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* \add out\add* of the \w cities|strong="G4172"\w* round \w about|strong="G4038"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w bringing|strong="G5342"\w* sick \w folks|strong="G0772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3791"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* were \w vexed|strong="G3791"\w* \w with|strong="G5259"\w* \w unclean|strong="G0169"\w* \w spirits|strong="G4151"\w*: and they were \w healed|strong="G2323"\w* every \w one|strong="G0537"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* they that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, (which \w is|strong="G5607"\w* the \w sect|strong="G0139"\w* of the \w Sadducees|strong="G4523"\w*,) and were \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w indignation|strong="G2205"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w laid|strong="G1911"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w common|strong="G1219"\w* \w prison|strong="G5084"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w angel|strong="G0032"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w* \w doors|strong="G2374"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w brought|strong="G1806"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w forth|strong="G1806"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*,

\w Go|strong="G4198"\w*, \w stand|strong="G2476"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* to the \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w words|strong="G4487"\w* \w of|strong="G2222"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add that\add*, they \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* early in the \w morning|strong="G3722"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w*. \w But|strong="G1161"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w called|strong="G4779"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w* \w together|strong="G4779"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w senate|strong="G1087"\w* of the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w prison|strong="G1201"\w* to \w have|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G3854"\w* the \w officers|strong="G5257"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w prison|strong="G5438"\w*, they \w returned|strong="G0390"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w told|strong="G0518"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, The \w prison|strong="G1201"\w* \w truly|strong="G3303"\w* found \w we|strong="G2147"\w* \w shut|strong="G2808"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w safety|strong="G0803"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w keepers|strong="G5441"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w without|strong="G1854"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* the \w doors|strong="G2374"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* when we had \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*, we \w found|strong="G2147"\w* no \w man|strong="G3762"\w* \w within|strong="G2080"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G5613"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G2409"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w captain|strong="G4755"\w* of the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the chief \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w things|strong="G3056"\w*, they \w doubted|strong="G1280"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w whereunto|strong="G0302"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* would \w grow|strong="G1096"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w came|strong="G3854"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, the \w men|strong="G0435"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w put|strong="G5087"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w prison|strong="G5438"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w temple|strong="G2411"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G5119"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* the \w captain|strong="G4755"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w officers|strong="G5257"\w*, \w and|strong="G5119"\w* \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w without|strong="G3326"\w* \w violence|strong="G0970"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* they should have been \w stoned|strong="G3034"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* when they had \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, they \w set|strong="G2476"\w* \add them\add* \w before|strong="G1722"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the high \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, Did \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w we|strong="G3853"\w* \w straitly|strong="G3852"\w* \w command|strong="G3853"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* that ye \w should|strong="G1321"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w*? \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, ye have \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w with|strong="G1322"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w doctrine|strong="G1322"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w intend|strong="G1014"\w* to \w bring|strong="G1863"\w* \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*.

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G0652"\w* \add other\add* \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w We|strong="G3980"\w* \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* to \w obey|strong="G3980"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w than|strong="G2228"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

The \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G3962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w fathers|strong="G3962"\w* raised \w up|strong="G1453"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w slew|strong="G1315"\w* and \w hanged|strong="G2910"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* a \w tree|strong="G3586"\w*.

\w Him|strong="G5126"\w* \w hath|strong="G5312"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w exalted|strong="G5312"\w* \w with|strong="G1188"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \add to be\add* a \w Prince|strong="G0747"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w Saviour|strong="G4990"\w*, for to \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w repentance|strong="G3341"\w* to \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w* \w of|strong="G4487"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w things|strong="G4487"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add so is\add* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w them|strong="G3980"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w obey|strong="G3980"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w When|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add that\add*, they were \w cut|strong="G1282"\w* \add to the heart\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* took \w counsel|strong="G1011"\w* to \w slay|strong="G0337"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* stood there \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w one|strong="G5100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w council|strong="G4892"\w*, a \w Pharisee|strong="G5330"\w*, \w named|strong="G3686"\w* \w Gamaliel|strong="G1059"\w*, a doctor of the \w law|strong="G3547"\w*, had in \w reputation|strong="G5093"\w* \w among|strong="G2992"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w people|strong="G2992"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* to \w put|strong="G4160"\w* the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w forth|strong="G1854"\w* a little \w space|strong="G1024"\w*;

\w And|strong="G5037"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, take \w heed|strong="G4337"\w* to \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* ye \w intend|strong="G3195"\w* to \w do|strong="G4238"\w* as \w touching|strong="G1909"\w* \w these|strong="G5125"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w Theudas|strong="G2333"\w*, \w boasting|strong="G3004"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w somebody|strong="G5100"\w*; to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* a \w number|strong="G0706"\w* of \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, \w about|strong="G5616"\w* four \w hundred|strong="G5071"\w*, joined \w themselves|strong="G4347"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w* was \w slain|strong="G0337"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w obeyed|strong="G3982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, were \w scattered|strong="G1262"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w nought|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* man rose \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* of \w Galilee|strong="G1057"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w days|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w taxing|strong="G0582"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* drew \w away|strong="G0868"\w* \w much|strong="G2425"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w* \w after|strong="G3694"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: he \w also|strong="G2548"\w* \w perished|strong="G0622"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \add even\add* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* \w obeyed|strong="G3982"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, were \w dispersed|strong="G1287"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* I \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w Refrain|strong="G0868"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w these|strong="G5130"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1439"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w alone|strong="G1439"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, it will come to \w nought|strong="G2647"\w*:
